Class GameLevel

      • GameLevel

        public GameLevel​(Game game)

    • Method Detail

      • addHearts

        public void addHearts()
        a collection which will deploy different numbers of hearts according to the level. The heartNumber will change at each level. only the character can collect the hearts. characters health will increase once collected

      • addCoins

        public void addCoins()
        A collection which will deploy different amounts of coins depending on the current level. The coinNumber will change at each level. both troll and character can collect the coins. the coin count will increment upon collision.

      • getPlayer

        public static Person getPlayer()
        returns the character
        Returns:
        character

      • getTroll

        public static Troll getTroll()
        returns troll
        Returns:
        troll

      • levelComplete

        public boolean levelComplete()
        Returns:
        true if conditions are met else false.

        conditions to go to the next level if condition is met, then overall score will be updated. coinCount will be reset for the next level

      • populate

        public abstract void populate()
        populates the world.
